welcome:
🤖 Hi! Great to see you here! 🎉

Before diving into the exciting world of trading, here are the steps to follow:

1. 📲 First, download the MetaTrader 5 app on your device.

2. 🔗 Log in to your Raise FX account using the information you received via email.

3. ✅ Once successfully logged in, come back here and type /start to begin.
